Class Piece

java.lang.Object
Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cat, Dog, Elephant, Leopard, Lion, Rat, Tiger, Wolf
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Represents a piece in the game. Each piece has a name, position, an associated player, and different conditions
